title: CSS Text Alignment and Text Direction

content.text: In this chapter you will learn about the following properties:
content.html: In this chapter you will learn about the following properties:

content.text: The text-align property is used to set the horizontal alignment of a text.
content.html: The text-align property is used to set the horizontal alignment of a text.

content.text: A text can be left or right aligned, centered, or justified.
content.html: A text can be left or right aligned, centered, or justified.

content.text: The following example shows center aligned, and left and right aligned text (left alignment is default if text direction is left-to-right, and right alignment is default if text direction is right-to-left):
content.html: The following example shows center aligned, and left and right aligned text (left alignment is default if text direction is left-to-right, and right alignment is default if text direction is right-to-left):

syntaxHighlighting.text:
h1 {  text-align: center;}h2 {  text-align: left;}h3 {  text-align: right;
}

content.code:
h1 {  text-align: center;}h2 {  text-align: left;}h3 {  text-align: right;
}

syntax_highlighting.text:
h1 {  text-align: center;}h2 {  text-align: left;}h3 {  text-align: right;
}

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-align: center;
}

h2 {
  text-align: left;
}

h3 {
  text-align: right;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
h1 {  text-align: center;}h2 {  text-align: left;}h3 {  text-align: right;
}

content.text: When the text-align property is set to "justify", each line is stretched so that every line has equal width, and the left and right margins are straight (like in magazines and newspapers):
content.html: When the text-align property is set to "justify", each line is stretched so that every line has equal width, and the left and right margins are straight (like in magazines and newspapers):

content.code_html:
div {
  text-align: justify;
}

content.text: The text-align-last property specifies how to align the last line of a text.
content.html: The text-align-last property specifies how to align the last line of a text.

content.code_html:
p.a {
  text-align-last: right;
}

p.b {
  text-align-last: center;
}

p.c {
  text-align-last: justify;
}

content.text: The direction and unicode-bidi properties can be used to change the text direction of an element:
content.html: The direction and unicode-bidi properties can be used to change the text direction of an element:

content.code_html:
p {
  direction: rtl;
  unicode-bidi: bidi-override;
}

content.text: The vertical-align property sets the vertical alignment of an element.
content.html: The vertical-align property sets the vertical alignment of an element.

content.code_html:
img.a {
  vertical-align: baseline;
}

img.b {
  vertical-align: text-top;
}

img.c {
  vertical-align: text-bottom;
}

img.d {
  vertical-align: sub;
}

img.e {
  vertical-align: super;
}

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
Which property is used to set the horizontal alignment of text in CSS?
content.html: Which property is used to set the horizontal alignment of text in CSS?

metadata.question: Which property is used to set the horizontal alignment of text in CSS?

content.question: Which property is used to set the horizontal alignment of text in CSS?

content.code_html:
Property Description
direction Specifies the text direction/writing direction
text-align Specifies the horizontal alignment of text
text-align-last Specifies how to align the last line of a text
unicode-bidi Used together with the direction property to set or return whether the text should be overridden to support multiple languages in the same document
vertical-align Sets the vertical alignment of an element
